tasks.task: Pruning a branch on a plant or tree.
subtasks: Observing the angle of the branch (45 degrees).
Identifying the location of auxins and hormones around the branch tip.
Locating the bud below the tip.
Determining the direction the bud will grow in based on the cutting location.
Cutting the branch at the correct node to direct the bud's growth outward and up.
Avoiding cutting the branch at an angle that would make the bud grow vertically instead of outward.
